wallet.register_desc1: The local wallet stores the wallet in your browser. It is encrypted with a password that you choose, and can be backed up using either a Mnemonic Phrase or an encrypted binary file that contains all the private keys. The local wallet lets you use multiple accounts at the same time.
wallet.register_desc2: The local wallet has the best security, but is restricted to your current browser and computer. To migrate the wallet to another browser or computer, you may use the backup file or Mnemonic Phrase.
wallet.restore_desc_phrase: In order to restore from a mnemonic phrase, you will need to create a new local wallet. Please provide your mnemonic phrase below and then enter your new local wallet  password.
wallet.restore_desc_key: you will need to create a new local wallet. Please provide your  Private Key below and then enter your new local wallet  password.
wallet.import_success_desc: It's time to get started. Click the button below to start backup.
wallet.restore_success_desc: Now that you've successfully restored an account, it's time to get started. Click the button below to start backup.

sub_title.fill_field: Fill all the fields below to create an account
sub_title.jump_to_reg: Sign In or Create a new account to continue
sub_title.backup_wallet: Take a Minute to Create a Backup
sub_title.wallet_user_list: List of Accounts Contained by the Wallet
sub_title.import_wallet: Import Using a Local Wallet Private Key

custom.add-desc:
In discretionary trading zone, trading pairs are sequentially compatible.
e.g. ETH/WSE pair and WSE/ETH pair are considered as the same trading pair WSE/ETH.
custom.added-existed-error: You have added the trading pair, please check.

order-form.fee-desc: Cybex is a decentralized exchange based on blockchain technology, and requires a transaction fee for Bid/Ask action.

errorMessage.404: The page could not be found.

tooltip.generated:
The generated password was created by your browser, locally.

No one but you can access it.

Please paste it below and save a copy in a safe place.
tooltip.balance_all:
This is the estimated value of all your assets, including any hidden assets, open orders, debt and collateral.

Estimation is using only live blockchain data and may not be perfectly accurate.
tooltip.create_asset: Click here to create and issue crypto assets
tooltip.memo_notice: Please ensure your tag is correct!
tooltip.coin_age_desc: Coin age is calculated based on the CYB in the CYBEX account. It is updated at UTC+00:00 every day.
tooltip.coin_age_rule_content0: Starting time: the date of CYBEX exchange launched
tooltip.coin_age_rule_content1: Coin age = coin age of the previous day * a depreciation coefficient (X = 0.975) + open interests of CYB for the day
tooltip.coin_age_rule_content2: Coin age of the first day = open interests of CYB
tooltip.coin_age_rule_content3: For the convenience, coin age on APP = coin age * (1 - depreciation coefficient)
tooltip.coin_age_note_content0: CYB in order and lock is not counted.
tooltip.coin_age_note_content1: If you have very little open interests or very large depreciation, the coin age may be 0 due to the accuracy.
tooltip.coin_age_example_content0: User A holds position of 10,000 CYB for one year, the coin age (A) = 10000*（1+0.975+……+0.975^364）=399960, while coin age on APP (A) = 399960*（1-0.975）= 9999.
tooltip.coin_age_example_content1: If user B wants to have the same coin age as user A, he/she needs to purchase CYB that is 40 times of A’s.
tooltip.coin_age_example_content2: If user C purchases 10,000 CYB and sells it the same day, coin age = 10000; After 28 days, C’s coin age = 10000*0.975^27 = 5048, which is a half of the initial.

validation.pwd_too_short: Password must be at least {len} characters
validation.pwd_number: Password must contain upper case, lower case, numbers and special characters
validation.pwd_number_simple: Password must contain upper case, lower case and numbers
validation.account_slash: Account name should contain at least one dash or a number
validation.account_slash_limit: Account name should not contain continuous dashes
validation.account_alpha: Account name should start with a lowercase letter
validation.account_number: Account name should end with a lowercase letter or number
validation.account_no_sign: Account name should only contain lowercase letters, dashes, or numbers

checkbox_label.warn_no_forgot: I understand that I will lose access to my funds if I lose my password
checkbox_label.warn_no_forgot_local: I know that if I lost my password and local wallet, it is impossible to find it back.
checkbox_label.warn_no_restore: I understand that no one can recover my password if I lose or forget it
checkbox_label.warn_backup: I have written down or otherwise stored my password
checkbox_label.warn_backup_local: I’ve already backup my local wallet and save it.
checkbox_label.warn_really_logout: I really want to logout, and I know what I am doing

info.cloud_wallet_desc1: The cloud wallet uses a password in combination with your account name to generate your private keys on the fly. It restricts you to only logging in with one account at a time, in return for ease of use and convenience.
info.cloud_wallet_desc2: We highly recommed to use password with more than 20 characters for the safety of your digital assets, you can easily get an appropriate password through our "Use Generated Password" section.
info.access_anywhere: The cloud wallet lets you login to your wallet from anywhere using only your account name and password, but a strong password is highly recommended!
info.start_exchange: Click the button below to start exploring.
info.logout: Please read and confirm the statments below carefully, then click the 'Logout' button, the browser will reload current page. Your account information will be erased.
info.local_logout: You're using the local wallet mode. If you didn't backup your wallet yet, please close the window and backup it and save appropriately.
info.eos_notice: Both a TAG and an Address are required to successfully deposit your {coinname} to Cybex
info.go_deposit_history: After making a deposit, you can track its progress on the D/W Record page
info.go_withdraw_history: After making a withdrawal, you can track its progress on the D/W Record page
info.version_notice:
Dear CYBEXers:



CYBEX Exchange has updated to a historic 2.0 Version with brand new trading interface that optimizes your trading experiences!


If you still want to use the former 1.0V, please go to:
info.transfer_notice:
You are going to transfer your assets to other's Cybex account.

This will require a transfer transaction within CYBEX, the transaction fee of which will be paid in CYB. If your CYB balance is insufficient, the fee will be deducted from your transaction asset.

  • Please make sure the accout of recipient is correct, otherwise you may lose the asset permanently.

  • It may take some time for each transfer to be confirmed, please kindly be patient.

contest_notice.line_2: The contest has a duration of 14 days. Participation by API and quantitative models is encouraged by the host that will provide various assistance for quantitative APIs.
contest_notice.line_3: This contest uses the virtual assets ARENA.ETH, ARENA.USDT, ARENA.EOS, ARENA.BTC that can be freely traded during the game (transfer not permitted). Only 3 trading pairs are accessible during the game: ARENA.ETH/ARENA.USDT, ARENA.EOS/ARENA.USDT, ARENA.BTC/ARENA.USDT.
contest_notice.line_4: Each contestant will be given an initial capital of 100,000 ARENA.USDT by the form of an airdrop once successfully registered to the game. During the competition, the host will take snapshots of the account balance of the competitors regularly and convert it to USDT value by the median price of the corresponding assets in CYBEX exchange.
contest_notice.line_5: Reward calculations are based on changes in account balances. The final rank will be made by considerating yield rate (ie, the difference between the balance and the initial capital), the Sharpe ratio (revenue volatility), and the turnover rate(accumulated volume per natural day exceeds 20%), etc. comprehensively. The real-time ranking status can be queried on the official website.
contest_notice.line_6: To ensure fairness, please help us in the prevention of cheating in any form.

backup_wallet.desc: Your local wallet is only stored in your browser, so it is crucial that you create a backup that will enable you to recover your wallet if the data in your browser is lost! No one else can restore your account if you lose your backup.
backup_wallet.importance: If you lose your local wallet or your pass phrase you will be unable to access any of your funds again. make sure you store the backup somewhere safe, and memorize or write down your password!

phrase.desc: In case you haven't already done so, it is crucial that you take the time to write down your mnemonic phrase now, whether it be on paper, or somewhere else.
phrase.importance: if you forget your pass phrase you will be unable to access your Mnemonic Phrase, we cannot reset or restore your password! Make sure you memorize or write down your password!
phrase.btn_confirm: I Had Written Down and Remembered My Mnemonic phrase

info.import_wallet: Enter your private key below to add the private key to your current local wallet
info.permission_notice: Do not give away your private key, once leaked, your funds will be in danger

dot_notice.title: Create Order to Mine CYB, Share 400,000 CYB!
dot_notice.line_1_1: Event Time: 13:00 on June 24, 2019 - 13:00 on June 26, 2019（UTC+8）
dot_notice.line_1_3: Tokens Rewarded in the Event: CYB with one-year lock-up period
dot_notice.line_1_5: Rewarded Amount: 400,000 CYB in two days
dot_notice.line_1_6: Share 200,000 CYB every day; Share 138.89 CYB every minute
dot_notice.line_2_1: Top 20 orders in Buy and Sell (Refer to the picture).
dot_notice.line_2_2: The amount of orders is no less than 100 CYB (including 100 CYB).
dot_notice.line_2_3: Orders need to be in the snapshots.
dot_notice.line_3_0: Bonus = (orders amount x weight)/(total points of top 20 in Buy + total points of top 20 in Sell) x 138.89
dot_notice.line_3_2: If the amount of orders is less than 100, the point is 0.
dot_notice.line_3_3: Time for snapshots: snapshot every minute in random time
dot_notice.line_3_4: Order decimal: based on 4-decimal aggregate volume
dot_notice.line_6_1: 1. Time for the total points: 13:00 on June 24 - 13:00 on June 26. Ranking is based on snapshots
dot_notice.line_6_3: 3. Extra bonus: CYB with one-year lock-up period
